title: Assistant Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Career Connect (United Kingdom) (Wirral, England)
Interview Descriptions:
Good communication from the HR team who sorted out my interview time slot and gave clear directions.  
The panel was made up of two managers + 1 person from HR but they were all friendly and helpful encouraging.  I never like interviews but they nudged full answers out of me and it felt like they were genuinely interested to hear my ideas and examples.
Interview Questions: There were 6 competency based questions and a short 10 min presentation

title: Project Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Career Connect (United Kingdom) (Liverpool, England) in Sept 2019
Interview Descriptions: clear instructions of location and time, enough time to prepare and materials available when  I had to do a presentation, the topic wasn't too difficult and I was made to feel at ease throughout the interview with the opportunity to ask for feedback if I required it to improve my interview skills or determine if I was on the right path.
Interview Questions: What was my skills and experience in project management
